item.title: New project coming to town - about ASP.NET Core
item.description: December is a great time to… start learning new things. You know - the atmosphere of New Year’s resolution and bringing somethink new to… your projects and skills. ASP.NET 3.5 Web Forms - what a … At the universtity this year I’ve started classes “Web application programming”. I thought it would be… wait for it… breathtakingm but it is not. We are learning a little old. We are learning outdated technology which for me - it’s a little bit puzzling.
